   296	    tot_latency = 0

   303	    prefill_latency = time.time() - tic
   304	    tot_latency += prefill_latency
   305	    throughput = input_len * batch_size / prefill_latency
   306	    rank_print(

   308	    )
   309	    measurement_results["prefill_latency"] = prefill_latency
   310	    measurement_results["prefill_throughput"] = throughput
   311	
   312	    # Decode
   313	    decode_latencies = []
   314	    for i in range(output_len - 1):

   316	        tic = time.time()

   333	    measurement_results["median_decode_throughput"] = med_decode_throughput
   334	
   335	    throughput = (input_len + output_len) * batch_size / tot_latency
   336	    rank_print(
